text: Chirixalus is a group of frogs in the family Rhacophoridae. Scientists used to think these frogs were part of of Chiromantis, but they started thinking of Chirixalus as its own group in 2020. ==Species== These species are in Chirixalus: * Chirixalus cherrapunjiae (Roonwal and Kripalani, 1966) * Chirixalus doriae Boulenger, 1893 * Chirixalus dudhwaensis Ray, 1992 * Chirixalus nongkhorensis (Cochran, 1927) *Chirixalus pantaiselatan (Munir, Hamidy, Kusrini, Kennedi, Ridha, Qayyim, Rafsanzani, and Nishikawa, 2021) * Chirixalus simus Annandale, 1915 * Chirixalus trilaksonoi (Riyanto and Kurniati, 2014) ==References== Category:Frogs of Asia
title: Chirixalus
